item.description:
Coming of Age
Opening Reception & Kick-off Celebration for Open Studios in Hartford

Join us for a massive group show will be featuring one piece of artwork from all the artists that are registered as Open Studio Weekend event artists, and other artists. The gallery show is themed "Coming of Age!" This exciting group show is a celebration of local arts and creativity! A free reception will be sponsored by local restaurants.

Live music will be provided by two groups: David Mack and Kristin Zhea. An exciting African dance performance will top the evening by Sanofoka Kuumba. Awards will be given out to three artists, as chosen by attendees and selected by jurors.
Be sure to bring some cash as several local organizations are donating items to a raffle, some of the items are tickets to local shows!

Attendees may park at Union Station, where a discounted rate will be provided by the Greater Hartford Transit District.
This event is FREE and open to the public.
item.how_to_find_us: I will wear the BW piano key scarf
item.name: Coming of Age
